text: The brutal and cowardly aggression and death of Daniel Zamudio hurt not only his family but also all people of good will.
I want to express my deepest feelings of affection and solidarity to the parents, family and friends of Daniel Zamudio.
His death will not go unpunished and reinforces the government's total commitment against arbitrary discrimination and a more tolerant country.

I make the commitment here that the local communities will be respected and that a new act of decentralization will be created. #Nice # FH2012
Do the French want to continue with the same President, the same policy? #Nice # FH2012
Or do the French want by a choice of conscience and confidence to give change all its success? #Nice # FH2012
I am the candidate for change. #Nice # FH2012
Do I have the cruelty to recall that the 2007 candidate promised to reduce unemployment to 5%? #Nice # FH2012
The last five years was the five-year period of failure and incoherence. #Nice # FH2012
Now the incumbent announces that he will now take care of the School! #Nice # FH2012
It is high time when 80 000 jobs were eliminated in the National Education. #Nice # FH2012
Aware of his weaknesses, he wants to hide his balance sheet, as if he had not governed. #Nice # FH2012
The right has been in power for 10 years. #Nice # FH2012
It would be too simple to think that the incumbent is guilty of nothing while he is responsible for everything. #Nice # FH2012
The crisis would have fallen like a bad rain, as if it were for nothing. #Nice # FH2012
But this crisis is that of unbridled capitalism. #Nice # FH2012
I learn this morning that the outgoing candidate promises to be a different president if he is re-elected. We know the method .. #Nice
That's right, we'll have to change: change the President if we want to change our presidency! #Nice # FH2012
There are so many doubts about the capacity of politics, so many fears that it is no longer possible to control our destiny. #Nice # FH2012
We will show that democracy is stronger than markets, that we have a recovery capacity! #Nice # FH2012
I will not turn away from my goal: recovery, mastering finance and giving priority to production. #Nice # FH2012
We will create the "generation contract": http://t.co/doCx8a0O #Nice # FH2012
We will create a training contract: for a long-term unemployed person, the condition of returning to work is training. #Nice # FH2012
I learn, a few hours ago, that one of the bosses of the CAC 40 has increased by 16 million euros. #Nice # FH2012
Yes, there will be justice, yes there will be a limit to these indecent incomes. #Nice # FH2012
Justice is to make sure to control rents where there is speculation. #Nice # FH2012
Our country deserves better than it has today, our country deserves change and hope. #Nice # FH2012
We must give all its place to the youth of France, which means that National Education will be a priority. #Nice # FH2012
I will establish a study allowance for young people, with means tests. #Nice # FH2012
We will put more Republic in the France of tomorrow. #Nice # FH2012
Everyone in the Republic must have the same rights and the same duties. #Nice # FH2012
We can not look at each other in their appearance but in their obviousness: every Frenchman is a citizen of France.
Secularism is not an eclipse value. There is no open or positive laïcité there is laïcité. #Nice # FH2012
Security is not a value of left or right. Security is an obligation. #Nice # FH2012
We will create closed centers to avoid jail, which is often the school of recidivism. #Nice # FH2012
To carry out this policy, we will need an impartial state and an independent judiciary. #Nice # FH2012
I lead this campaign with tenacity, I have a course and I do not deviate. #Nice # FH2012
Yes, I'll hold on, to the end! Hold on because I want us to win the presidential election together. #Nice # FH2012
The right will use all the fears: the fear of the other, the fear of the future, the fear of the left. #Nice # FH2012
The right will say "if the left comes back, it will empty the boxes". But it's already done! #Nice # FH2012
France may be able to change the direction of Europe. #Nice # FH2012
The greatest danger would be to think that we could no longer act. #Nice # FH2012
This campaign must enable us to make change irreversible! #Nice # FH2012
The right can not expect to stay in power unless the French come to doubt themselves. #Nice # FH2012
I want the victory to be decided. She is close, but she is not acquired! #Nice # FH2012

I have just announced a news: in 2012 there will be a Socialist President who will succeed François Mitterrand! #Lands # FH2012
We do not want to distinguish the French according to their origins, their skin color or their convictions. #Lands # FH2012
I came to tell all those who doubt: yes change is possible, it is at hand, it depends only on you. #Lands # FH2012
Only one question is asked: do we want to continue or change? #Lands # FH2012
The presidential election in France is also a European election. #Lands # FH2012
France is hope, progress, equality and trust! #Lands # FH2012
I want a France stronger, more just, more confident in its future and in its youth! #Lands # FH2012
The challenge of this election is confidence: restore confidence to the French. #Lands # FH2012
I must deserve your trust. The first act will be to master finance to put it at the service of our economy. #Lands # FH2012
The second act will stimulate investment. We will create a public investment bank. #Lands # FH2012
If we want to change, if the French want to turn the page, I am the only one who, with you, can write the next! #Lands # FH2012
I am a candidate to fully exercise the responsibility of the country. #Lands # FH2012
